name: tdv-react
description: React library that allows form validation manipulation through TypeScript Decorators

scripts.build: npm run test && npm run clean && tsc
scripts.deploy:minor: npm cache clean --force --silent && npm i --force --silent && npm run build && npm version minor --force --silent && npm publish --access=public --silent && git add . && git commit -m 'bump react minor version' && git push
scripts.deploy:major: npm cache clean --force --silent && npm i --force --silent && npm run build && npm version major --force --silent && npm publish --access=public --silent && git add . && git commit -m 'bump react major version' && git push

author: Bruno Tot
